sense.def:
Izraz
themselves
uporabljamo kot predmet v stavku ali za predlogom, ki se nanaša na iste osebe ali stvari kot osebek stavka ali prejšnji predmet v stavku.

seg.quote: They are trying to educate themselves.
They had ceased to think of themselves as rebels.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
themselves
tudi poudarimo osebek ali predmet stavka v tretji osebi množine in jasno pokažemo, o kom ali čem govorimo.

seg.quote: Let's turn to the books themselves.
...a cultural preference on the part of the Chinese themselves.

sense.def:
Kadar ljudje nekaj naredijo
themselves
, tisto storijo brez pomoči ali vmešavanja kogarkoli.

seg.quote: They must settle it themselves and get their own solutions.
